![Visitors are in a Greek and Roman gallery at The Met that is filled with large white statues of figures. It's evening and the room is dark with spotlights on the art.  ](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/441e3b2a3fcc15e770c29d1458351be3697da1ac-5304x5304.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

# The Met Collection

## Travel around the world and across 5,000 years of history through 490,000+ works of art.

## Browse the Art

![Brightly lit gallery with objects in vitrines at various elevations in the background. In the center are several seated statues on pedestals.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/fc460c2783c573bd0904b742d433178a4cc8856d-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Gold statue of a nude woman, pointing a bow and arrow in the direction of a stately gray facade.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/44403543f49abe362b8a85b493e7558396592ab1-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Bright gallery with white pedestals showcasing a variety of stone statues and objects in glass cases.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/8085b5b608bffc5be90cd079c676c53790c91762-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Rendering of the New Galleries for the Art of the Ancient West Asia and Cyprus](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/624adef67c03711f48be4ef1f01973a86569bab3-3200x1800.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Knights parade through the equestrian court](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/a997555f04a3f04913f5371872189f54f48b2634-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![View of the Astor Court pavilion surrounded by low plants and stones.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/8d444b05b042dcbdd1c317fc8e3ecf27efad830b-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![A collection of elegant yellow dresses displayed in arched niches, showcasing diverse styles and textures against a minimalist backdrop.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/2b08e1eb0aebef011d6714992a3f9f855e6a4b40-3200x1800.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Room with wooden floors, gray walls, and framed drawings and prints.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/cb1c1fd13c449316c4ff9d7c99c228b764cbc2db-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![An ancient Egyptian temple structure with two columns in front displayed inside a museum.  ](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/ef4e325e9e9b0f121c79b168300f5c9d6cc6d32f-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Art gallery interior featuring oil paintings of interior scenes in ornate gold frames, with a blue wall and wooden flooring.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/258a0b2d9b5e9d007e4b6498f71d46deb5a4aa69-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![A sunlit gallery featuring classical sculptures against elegant stone walls, with large windows allowing natural light to flow in.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/db9d9d374eb7ed521854067c04a3695d8d6044a6-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![A view of the Greek and Roman Galleries in soft daylight with no visitors. The contrasts of the black floor and pedestals and white stone statues and columns creates a dramatic image.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/3513bc5d23fe1cc24c46f03d1b3900cd3caa26ee-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Islamic Art galleries at The Met](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/e15cf1b84c1d4d74bd5db0c4dc0302686bdb3b60-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![An indoor atrium featuring a stone fountain surrounded by potted plants and benches, with large, bright windows overhead.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/52d17bb1b9ae4aac6eb0ad246b19ed11b911d5d1-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![ ](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/03c55f442c0c043c6fb52470901f6e57fae913f6-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![A spacious museum gallery with a Spanish choir screen in the center and filled with large-scale medieval sculptures, altarpieces, tapestries, and furniture.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/b7eeadbd8219688fa395d328b113db973717cbfb-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Large sculpture on the roof of The Met. ](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/8f6a196a7cfdb83188d27e8aa5eb2272e1c74ebf-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![A majestic wooden pipe organ with gold pipes, viewed from below, set against an elegant, intricately designed ceiling.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/fec87f7618e3b2c8946179ab4df67b1e9845f968-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Tall ancestor poles arranged in a curve in the center of a bright white gallery space.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/bd19c9299e817c2ffff4e6c01e21cf4e8684a302-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![A gallery room with black-and-white portrait photographs on the walls and a display case containing open books in the center.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/efba12cab6c410e377aa25f94a8066977c65d9f6-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

## Collection Research and Resources
